The Vijay Muhurat is considered the most auspicious time on Dussehra. It is believed that any task or venture started during this period will be successful. Traditionally, this was the time kings would begin their military expeditions. Today, people perform Shami Puja, start new businesses, or purchase new vehicles and property during this powerful window of time.
All timings are based on standard Panchang calculations and may vary slightly based on your exact location and local calendar. Please consult a local priest or astrologer for precise timings.
